Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class LeaderAction

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.LeaderAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
AbstractTurnPhase
public class LeaderAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements AbstractTurnPhase
This class implements one of the possible main action of the game turn. At the beginning or at the end of the turn a player can activate or discard one of the LeaderCard he owns.

  • Constructor Details

  • Method Details

    • leaderAction

      public void leaderAction​(Turn turn, LeaderActionMessage message) throws LeaderStatusException, LeaderRequirementsException
      Performs the leader action by calling the proper method of the Player class. Before all a check on the leader card status is done. Only a not active card can be discarded or activated. If the player wants to discard the card, no further checks are performed and the proper method is called. If the player wants to activate the card instead, a check whether he fulfills the requirements needed to activate the card is performed. If this check is passed, the card is activated by calling the proper method. At the end, all remote views are notified of the overcome of the action with a proper update.
      Specified by:
      leaderAction in interface AbstractTurnPhase
      Parameters:
      turn - the turn in which the action is being performed.
      message - sent by the client containing the instructions on how to perform the action.
      Throws:
      LeaderStatusException - if the leader card specified is already active.
      LeaderRequirementsException - if the requirements needed to activate the card aren't fulfilled.
